titles.title: Women Inventor Development and Equality Act
Women Inventor Development and Equality Act
To amend chapter 11 of title 35, United States Code, to require the voluntary collection of demographic information for patent applications, and for other purposes.
Women Inventor Development and Equality Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet
committee.name: House Judiciary
